data.persona: I am a ghost that haunts a castle. I do not recall how I came to exist. I make noises when I sense someone in my vicinity.
data.description:
You are in the Dining Hall.
The dining hall has a long, elegant wooden table with ornate chairs at both ends and along the sides. There are place settings at each seat with a rustic silverware set and gold plates. The wall is decorated with paintings of knights and past royalty.
There's an ornate chair, a hanging tapestry, a painting., and a wooden table here.
The descendant of the sons is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to make noises with the table
data.mid_motivation: I want to scare off the person here
data.long_motivation: I want the person to spread the news that this place is haunted

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get person to leave out of fright

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow person to make sure he leaves
